type.name: type_geo_project
type.children: <entries> <entry name="Sites" type="type_map_folder" entryorder="10"/> <entry name="Documents" type="type_document_collection" entryorder="20"/> <entry name="Private" type="group" entryorder="30"> <permissions> <permission action="view"> <role role="none"/> </permission> </permissions> </entry> </entries>
type.wiki:
+section title={{name}} :navtop {{description wikify=true}} +row +col-8 :heading Sites {{map entry="child:type:type_map_folder"}} :heading Contents {{tabletree message="" simple="false" #maxHeight="500px" }} -col +col-4 +center {{image inherited="true" showCaption=true message="" width="80%" style="margin-bottom:10px;" useThumbnail="true" }} -center :vspace 1em {{properties message="" inherited="true" metadata.types="content.license" includeTitle=false}} -center -col -row :vspace 1em ---- :vspace 1em :heading Search Project {{display_entrylist startWithAny=true showAncestor=false ancestor=this metadataTypes="" entryTypes="type_borehole_log,type_borehole_las,type_borehole_wcl,type_borehole_image,type_borehole_fieldplot" orderByTypes="name,relevant,createdate,date,size" displayTypes="list,map,images" includeNonImages=false }}
:heading Project Information {{information showDetails="true" showTitle="false" #menus="file,edit,view,feeds,other,service" #menusTitle="Services" }} -section

type.name: type_geo_site
type_borehole_log
type.property: +section title="Borehole Log: {{name}}" {{group}} {{display_profile showMenu=true yAxisReverse=true marginTop=25 profileMode=markers profileMode="lines" indexField=".*depth.*" fields="#2,#3"}}

type.name: type_borehole_las
type.property: +section title="Log ASCII: {{name}}" {{group}} {{display_profile showMenu=true yAxisReverse=true marginTop=25 profileMode="lines" indexField=".*depth.*" fields="#2,#3"}}

type.name: type_borehole_image
type.wiki:
+section title="Borehole image: {{name}}" :navtop +row +col-8 {{group}} {{description wikify=true}} {{image width=90% popup=true}} :vspace 1em ---- :vspace 1em :heading Information {{information details="true" showTitle="false" showResource=false}} -col +col-4 {{field name="tool" row.label="Tool:"}} {{field name="measurement" row.label="Measurement:"}}
+center {{mapentry hideIfNoLocations=true width="90%" height="200px"}} -center -col -row -section

type.name: type_borehole_fieldplot
type.wiki:
+section title="Borehole Field Plot: {{name}}" :navtop +row +col-8 {{group}} {{description wikify=true}} {{media full=true width=90%}} :vspace 1em ---- :vspace 1em :heading Information {{information details="true" showTitle="false" showResource=false}} -col +col-4 {{field name="tool" row.label="Tool:"}} {{field name="measurement" row.label="Measurement:"}}
+center {{mapentry hideIfNoLocations=true width="90%" height="200px"}} -center -col -row -section
